meanings.definition: a person who initiates or originates new ideas or methods
meanings.sent1: As a groundbreaker, she introduced a new way of solving problems in our team.
meanings.sent2: The groundbreaker in technology developed the first computer chip.
meanings.sent3: The groundbreaker at the party suggested playing musical chairs with a twist.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was a groundbreaker, breaking through traditional barriers.
meanings.sent5: He was known as a groundbreaker for his innovative approach to architecture.

meanings.definition: something that is innovative or pioneering
meanings.sent1: The new smartphone model was a groundbreaker in the industry.
meanings.sent2: This invention is a groundbreaker in the field of medicine.
meanings.sent3: The groundbreaker of a cake recipe included unexpected ingredients.
meanings.sent4: Her fashion sense was a groundbreaker, setting new trends effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The groundbreaker in sustainable energy changed the way we power our homes.
